metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 2 no. 43
metadata.description: French text followed by Dutch translation
A declaration stating that certain places shall be free for fishing

Concemnation of: [1] Centuria colloquiorum Dei et animae, quibus de gratia doctrinam e campo disputandi Martio in placidum meditandi Elysium compendiario transducere conatus est, by Johannes Wierts. [2] Opuscula theologica, ejusdem Apologia, by Michael Baius. [3] Le miroir de la piété chrétienne, by Flore de Sainte Foy [pseud. of Gabriel Gerbron]
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title and cover pages combined.
